oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Management of common small ruminant medical and surgical diseases
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Van Metre, David C.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: sheep
goats
anesthesia
surgery
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Every practitioner develops his or her own unique and efficient ways of doing things, and the author has collected a few of these tricks from personal experience, the veterinary literature, and veterinary technicians and practitioners. This seminar will include a variety of useful tips for a variety of commonly used procedures for South American camelids (SACs), sheep, and goats in a field setting.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2015; 130-133
